def_cn: 使减至最低程度;使保持最低程度
def_en: If you minimize a risk, problem, or unpleasant situation, you reduce it to the lowest possible level, or prevent it increasing beyond that level.

def_cn: 对…轻描淡写；使显得不重要
def_en: If you minimize something, you make it seem smaller or less significant than it really is.

def_cn: 把(计算机屏幕上的窗口)最小化
def_en: If you minimize a window on a computer screen, you make it very small, because you do not want to use it.
